name: BREACH (itch) (Tiff_D)
description:
You are a member of the special unit sent to deal with a massive containment breach of the biological specimens containment facility, housing many aggressive monstrosities held there for research purposes… allegedly. Outnumbered, you are the only surviving member of your unit and the only thing you can do is to see your task to fruition, eliminating any and all abnormalities before they ultimately breach the building, the only barrier between them and the outside world.

List of inputs:

Input

Functionality

W

Move forward

S

Move downward

A

Move towards the left

D

Move towards the right

Left Click

Shoot bullets in the player's direction

Right Click

Throw Grenades in the player's direction

ESC Key                      

Pause the game to pause the menu and change the settings

W & Left Click

Move Forward slower and shooting

S & Left Click

Move backwards slower and shooting

A & Left Click

Moving sideways towards the left while shooting

D & Left Click

Moving sideways towards the right while shooting

Spacebar

Player will Jump

Enter

When the player is on GrenadeSellZone or BulletSellZone, Press Enter to buy if have enough money.

Shift & moving the mouse

When holding down shift move the mouse to rotate the camera.
